name: obsidian-hide-folders
description: ObsidianMD plugin that hides & toggles configured folders (e.g. attachments folders).

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && cp manifest.json dist
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: jonasdoesthings.com
